"Hey, <%me>?": "I'm just... a little bit mad at you."
"When the [Profound Darkness] transferred from Shiva to you... You vanished somewhere. Alone."
"You sacrificed yourself to save the world. Didn't you say you wouldn't do that?"
"We'd never leave each other behind. We made a promise, didn't we?"
"I only did what you would have done."
"B-But! We both came back okay. Right now, we can talk together like this."
"...Hehe. No, I'm the one who should be sorry. I was only a little mad."
"After all, you did come back okay. Right now, we can talk together like this."
"We've been close together ever since the beginning, but I know there will also be times when we can't see each other."
"So, just you and me, let's talk together. Just you and me, let's wonder together."
"You and I, without sacrificing ourselves, will smile together with everyone forever."
"From now on, we'll always be together, okay?"
